DOC.detailed_description: Irinotecan ( CPT-11 ) promise camptothecin analogue activity solid tumor . In Phase I study use short intravenous infusion schedule , predominant drug toxicity gastrointestinal , diarrhea , myelosuppression . In animal study , prolonged infusion schedule follow short drug-free interval result preservation antitumor activity decrease drug toxicity . Therefore , propose examine 96 hour infusion schedule irinotecan alternate 72 hour drug-free interval patient solid tumor order determine maximum tolerate dose regimen . The duration treatment escalate Phase I study patient receive therapy 2 every 3 week . Standard Phase I drug toxicity tumor response information monitor pharmacokinetics irinotecan active metabolite , SN-38 also examine . We also attempt monitor intracellular molecular effect SN-38 therapy blood , bone marrow , , whenever possible , tumor tissue .
